Name: Gain 1 ego Flex and roll on the Story Event table.
Description: Gain 1 ego Flex and roll on the Story Event table.

Name: One (or both) of your parents is bilingual. Gain an extra language (your choice or roll randomly, p. XX).
Description: One (or both) of your parents is bilingual. Gain an extra language (your choice or roll randomly, p. XX).

Name: You leave home at an early age and forge your own path. Choose a new motivation (or roll for one on p. XX).
Description: You leave home at an early age and forge your own path. Choose a new motivation (or roll for one on p. XX).

Name: The people that raise you do not tolerate foolishness. Gain the Common Sense trait (p. 73, EP2).
Description: The people that raise you do not tolerate foolishness. Gain the Common Sense trait (p. 73, EP2).

Name: You are glued to the mesh from an early age. Gain the Online Obsession trait (p. XX)
Description: You are glued to the mesh from an early age. Gain the Online Obsession trait (p. XX)

Name: Some threat or danger looms over your youth. You learn to watch for trouble. +10 Perceive skill.
Description: Some threat or danger looms over your youth. You learn to watch for trouble. +10 Perceive skill.

Name: You are good with computers from a young age. +10 Interface skill.
Description: You are good with computers from a young age. +10 Interface skill.

Name: A childhood injury or disease limits your physical activities. You gain the Poor Coordination (Level 2) trait (p. 79, EP2).
Description: A childhood injury or disease limits your physical activities. You gain the Poor Coordination (Level 2) trait (p. 79, EP2).

Name: You are kept at home and not allowed to play sports or with other kids. Reduce your REF by 5.
Description: You are kept at home and not allowed to play sports or with other kids. Reduce your REF by 5.

Name: You grow up in a maze-like urban area or a difficult rural area. Gain the Direction Sense trait (p. 73, EP2).
Description: You grow up in a maze-like urban area or a difficult rural area. Gain the Direction Sense trait (p. 73, EP2).

Name: You grow up in an environment where carelessness can get you killed. Increase INT by 5.
Description: You grow up in an environment where carelessness can get you killed. Increase INT by 5.

Name: You have a falling out with your parents and cut ties. Gain the Stalwart (Level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).
Description: You have a falling out with your parents and cut ties. Gain the Stalwart (Level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).

Name: Your muse helps you out in some rough situations. Gain the Exceptional Muse (p. XX) trait.
Description: Your muse helps you out in some rough situations. Gain the Exceptional Muse (p. XX) trait.

Name: You skip too much school. You gain the Obtuseness (Level 2) trait (p. 79, EP2).
Description: You skip too much school. You gain the Obtuseness (Level 2) trait (p. 79, EP2).

Name: Constant torment from abusive siblings takes its toll. Reduce WIL by 5.
Description: Constant torment from abusive siblings takes its toll. Reduce WIL by 5.

Name: Growing up isolated from others, you develop introvert tendencies. Reduce your SAV by 5.
Description: Growing up isolated from others, you develop introvert tendencies. Reduce your SAV by 5.

Name: While your friends throw themselves into VR gaming worlds, you simply throw up. Gain the VR Vertigo trait (p. 80, EP2).
Description: While your friends throw themselves into VR gaming worlds, you simply throw up. Gain the VR Vertigo trait (p. 80, EP2).

Name: Your life is a struggle for survival, but you persevere. Gain the Hard Knocks trait (p. XX).
Description: Your life is a struggle for survival, but you persevere. Gain the Hard Knocks trait (p. XX).

Name: Raised in an environment of constant stimulus, you are forced to tune out. Gain the Obliviousness trait (p. 79, EP2).
Description: Raised in an environment of constant stimulus, you are forced to tune out. Gain the Obliviousness trait (p. 79, EP2).

Name: You are extremely sheltered. Gain the Real World Naiveté trait (p. 80, EP2) and skip Step 7 (XX).
Description: You are extremely sheltered. Gain the Real World Naiveté trait (p. 80, EP2) and skip Step 7 (XX).

Name: Through no fault of your own, you inherit the Mental Disorder (Bipolar) trait (pp. 79 and 224, EP2).
Description: Through no fault of your own, you inherit the Mental Disorder (Bipolar) trait (pp. 79 and 224, EP2).

Name: You grow up in a melting-pot, polyglot culture. Gain the Hyper Linguistics (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).
Description: You grow up in a melting-pot, polyglot culture. Gain the Hyper Linguistics (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).

Name: You party too hard. –10 to two separate skills of your choice.
Description: You party too hard. –10 to two separate skills of your choice.

Name: The quality of your childhood education is poor. –10 to one Know skill of your choice.
Description: The quality of your childhood education is poor. –10 to one Know skill of your choice.

Name: A healthy amount of physical activities improves your abilities. Increase SOM by 5.
Description: A healthy amount of physical activities improves your abilities. Increase SOM by 5.

Name: You are put in charge of other children at a young age. Increase WIL by 5.
Description: You are put in charge of other children at a young age. Increase WIL by 5.

Name: You challenge your intellect by learning things online. Gain the Acumen (Level 2) trait (p. 72, EP2).
Description: You challenge your intellect by learning things online. Gain the Acumen (Level 2) trait (p. 72, EP2).

Name: A misunderstood situation makes you the laughing stock of your peer group. Gain the Social Ineptitude trait (p. XX)
Description: A misunderstood situation makes you the laughing stock of your peer group. Gain the Social Ineptitude trait (p. XX)

Name: Shoplifting and stealing are either hobbies or a necessity. Increase REF by 5.
Description: Shoplifting and stealing are either hobbies or a necessity. Increase REF by 5.

Name: You experiment with drugs, but it isn’t for you. Gain the Temptation Immunity trait (p. XX).
Description: You experiment with drugs, but it isn’t for you. Gain the Temptation Immunity trait (p. XX).

Name: Exposure to death/violence alters your mind. Gain the Mental Disorder (Impulse Control) trait (pp. 79 & 225, EP2).
Description: Exposure to death/violence alters your mind. Gain the Mental Disorder (Impulse Control) trait (pp. 79 & 225, EP2).

Name: You focus on learning or socializing more than playtime or sports. Gain the Feebleness (level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).
Description: You focus on learning or socializing more than playtime or sports. Gain the Feebleness (level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).

Name: A dysfunctional home life keeps you from doing well in school. Reduce your COG by 5.
Description: A dysfunctional home life keeps you from doing well in school. Reduce your COG by 5.

Name: Being a bully has its advantages. Increase Provoke by 5 and gain the Intimidation specialization.
Description: Being a bully has its advantages. Increase Provoke by 5 and gain the Intimidation specialization.

Name: A series of traumatic events leaves you disturbed. Gain the Mental Disorder (Insomnia) trait (pp. 79 and 225, EP2).
Description: A series of traumatic events leaves you disturbed. Gain the Mental Disorder (Insomnia) trait (pp. 79 and 225, EP2).

Name: A strict environment stunts your creativity. Reduce INT by 5.
Description: A strict environment stunts your creativity. Reduce INT by 5.

Name: You receive your first cortical stack at an early age—and luckily just in time. Roll on the Random Morph table (p. XX).
Description: You receive your first cortical stack at an early age—and luckily just in time. Roll on the Random Morph table (p. XX).

Name: You lead your friends into all sorts of trouble. –10 c-rep but +10 g-rep.
Description: You lead your friends into all sorts of trouble. –10 c-rep but +10 g-rep.

Name: You have few friends and rarely socialize with other kids. You gain the Indifference (Level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).
Description: You have few friends and rarely socialize with other kids. You gain the Indifference (Level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).

Name: Your parents raise you with some unusual ideas. Gain the Implicit Bias trait (p. XX).
Description: Your parents raise you with some unusual ideas. Gain the Implicit Bias trait (p. XX).

Name: You cheat your way through school. –10 to one skill of your choice.
Description: You cheat your way through school. –10 to one skill of your choice.

Name: You enjoy urban exploration and getting into off-limits areas. +10 Infiltrate skill.
Description: You enjoy urban exploration and getting into off-limits areas. +10 Infiltrate skill.

Name: As a free-range kid, you learn how to get around on your own. +10 Survival skill.
Description: As a free-range kid, you learn how to get around on your own. +10 Survival skill.

Name: You spend too much time online, ignoring/escaping the real world. You gain the Poor Instincts (Level 2) trait (p. 80, EP2).
Description: You spend too much time online, ignoring/escaping the real world. You gain the Poor Instincts (Level 2) trait (p. 80, EP2).

Name: You either excel in your studies or fall under the care of a mentor who helps you learn. Increase COG by 5.
Description: You either excel in your studies or fall under the care of a mentor who helps you learn. Increase COG by 5.

Name: A traumatic childhood leaves you with a warped sense of self. Gain the Mental Disorder (Narcissitic Personality) trait (pp. 79 and 225, EP2).
Description: A traumatic childhood leaves you with a warped sense of self. Gain the Mental Disorder (Narcissitic Personality) trait (pp. 79 and 225, EP2).

Name: Your parents are highly private and extremely strict. Gain the Poor Socialization trait (p. XX).
Description: Your parents are highly private and extremely strict. Gain the Poor Socialization trait (p. XX).

Name: A personality quirk gains the attention of your peers, then becomes a noticeable part of your daily behavior. Gain the Identifiable Quirk trait (p. XX).
Description: A personality quirk gains the attention of your peers, then becomes a noticeable part of your daily behavior. Gain the Identifiable Quirk trait (p. XX).

Name: Your mesh access is restricted or unavailable, and you never pick up the skills. Gain the Mesh Naiveté trait (p. XX).
Description: Your mesh access is restricted or unavailable, and you never pick up the skills. Gain the Mesh Naiveté trait (p. XX).

Name: You either take track or learn to run from bullies. Gain the Fitness (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).
Description: You either take track or learn to run from bullies. Gain the Fitness (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).

Name: You learn the hard way to trust your intuition. Gain the Good Instincts (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).
Description: You learn the hard way to trust your intuition. Gain the Good Instincts (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).

Name: A series of childhood injuries leaves you struggling to catch up physically. Reduce SOM by 5.
Description: A series of childhood injuries leaves you struggling to catch up physically. Reduce SOM by 5.

Name: You lose all of your close friends in a horribly awkward teen social situation. Gain the Uncooperative Tendencies trait (p. XX).
Description: You lose all of your close friends in a horribly awkward teen social situation. Gain the Uncooperative Tendencies trait (p. XX).

Name: Tormented by bullies as a kid, you learn to stand up for yourself. +10 Melee skill.
Description: Tormented by bullies as a kid, you learn to stand up for yourself. +10 Melee skill.

Name: The strictness of your parents leaves you only one choice: to excel at lying. +10 Deceive skill.
Description: The strictness of your parents leaves you only one choice: to excel at lying. +10 Deceive skill.

Name: Your friends have rough childhoods, but you help them out. Gain the Empathy (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).
Description: Your friends have rough childhoods, but you help them out. Gain the Empathy (Level 2) trait (p. 74, EP2).

Name: You grow up around violence but learn to avoid it. Gain the Quickness (level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).
Description: You grow up around violence but learn to avoid it. Gain the Quickness (level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).

Name: After seeing friends and family ruined by drugs and vices, you resolve yourself against temptation. Gain the Resolve (level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).
Description: After seeing friends and family ruined by drugs and vices, you resolve yourself against temptation. Gain the Resolve (level 2) trait (p. 75, EP2).

Name: Your youth is stressful. Gain the Mental Disorder (Anxiety) trait (pp. 79 and 224, EP2).
Description: Your youth is stressful. Gain the Mental Disorder (Anxiety) trait (pp. 79 and 224, EP2).

Name: You resleeve at an early age, but come to hate your new body. Gain the Morph Aversion trait (p. XX) and roll on the Random Morph table (p. XX).
Description: You resleeve at an early age, but come to hate your new body. Gain the Morph Aversion trait (p. XX) and roll on the Random Morph table (p. XX).

OptionLists.Name: You resleeve at an early age, but come to hate your new body. Gain the Morph Aversion trait (p. XX) and roll on the Random Morph table (p. XX).

Name: Adults are rarely up-to-speed on technological changes, and you use that to your advantage. Gain +10 Infosec skill.
Description: Adults are rarely up-to-speed on technological changes, and you use that to your advantage. Gain +10 Infosec skill.

Name: You are a juvenile delinquent and frequently get into trouble. –10 c-rep.
Description: You are a juvenile delinquent and frequently get into trouble. –10 c-rep.

Name: Your family’s assets take a hit. Lose 1 level of the Resources trait. If you don’t have Resources, a relative is indentured.
Description: Your family’s assets take a hit. Lose 1 level of the Resources trait. If you don’t have Resources, a relative is indentured.

Name: You are raised in dangerous conditions where you have to adapt or die. +10 Fray skill.
Description: You are raised in dangerous conditions where you have to adapt or die. +10 Fray skill.

Name: You fall in with the wrong crowd. Replace one active skill with Melee (or Guns if you already have Melee) at the same value.
Description: You fall in with the wrong crowd. Replace one active skill with Melee (or Guns if you already have Melee) at the same value.

OptionLists.Name: Replace 1 Active Skill with Melee, Or guns if you already have melee at the same value
OptionLists.Description: Replace 1 Active Skill with Melee, Or guns if you already have melee at the same value

Name: Your mind is either unusually shaped (if AGI/uplift) or damaged when young. Gain the Anomalous Mind trait (p. XX).
Description: Your mind is either unusually shaped (if AGI/uplift) or damaged when young. Gain the Anomalous Mind trait (p. XX).

Name: You are raised in an abusive environment. Gain the Pain Tolerance (Level 1) trait (p. 74, EP2).
Description: You are raised in an abusive environment. Gain the Pain Tolerance (Level 1) trait (p. 74, EP2).

Name: You take apart the family robots (or any you get your hands on). +10 Hardware: Electronics or Hardware: Robotics.
Description: You take apart the family robots (or any you get your hands on). +10 Hardware: Electronics or Hardware: Robotics.

Name: You fall deep into some type of fandom. +10 Research skill and replace one Know skill field with one relevant to the fandom.
Description: You fall deep into some type of fandom. +10 Research skill and replace one Know skill field with one relevant to the fandom.

OptionLists.Name: Replace one Know skill field with one relevant to the fandom.
OptionLists.Description: Replace one Know skill field with one relevant to the fandom.

Name: In an effort to inhibit your deviant/criminal behavior, you are forcefully subjected to mind editing as a young adult. Gain the Restricted Behavior (Level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).
Description: In an effort to inhibit your deviant/criminal behavior, you are forcefully subjected to mind editing as a young adult. Gain the Restricted Behavior (Level 2) trait (p. 78, EP2).

Name: You are orphaned and spend your early life in uncaring foster homes. Lose 1 ego Flex.
Description: You are orphaned and spend your early life in uncaring foster homes. Lose 1 ego Flex.

Name: You are a hardcore nerd. Replace one Active skill with a Know skill of your choice at an equivalent rating.
Description: You are a hardcore nerd. Replace one Active skill with a Know skill of your choice at an equivalent rating.

OptionLists.Name: Replace one Active skill with a Know skill of your choice at an equivalent rating.
OptionLists.Description: Replace one Active skill with a Know skill of your choice at an equivalent rating.

Name: Your family scores a windfall. Gain the Resource (level 1) trait (p. 75, EP2).
Description: Your family scores a windfall. Gain the Resource (level 1) trait (p. 75, EP2).

Name: You teach yourself to drive … years before you are allowed to. +10 Pilot: Ground but –10 c-rep.
Description: You teach yourself to drive … years before you are allowed to. +10 Pilot: Ground but –10 c-rep.

Name: You are the most popular kid in school. Increase your SAV by 5.
Description: You are the most popular kid in school. Increase your SAV by 5.

Name: You are taught unusual things at a young age. Gain one Exotic Skill (p. 48, EP2) of your choice at 30.
Description: You are taught unusual things at a young age. Gain one Exotic Skill (p. 48, EP2) of your choice at 30.
